segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink, totally engrossed in her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, but she's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the edge—wow, that's unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming quickly on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets are open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a stool, reaching right into it—didn't see that coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting; that's precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, trying to balance everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm up, clearly wanting in on the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, bushes and fence in the background.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the dishes and the overflow alike.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is happening without anyone noticing the main issues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is full of surprises today.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
